stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements accurately describes how Mexico and Russia have responded to market forces regarding ownership of their oil and natural gas industry?
choicesHtml: Mexico and Russia have privatized their oil and natural gas industry.
Mexico has privatized some of its oil and natural gas industry, while Russia has renationalized its oil and natural gas industry.
Mexico and Russia have recently nationalized their oil and natural gas industry.
Mexico has renationalized its oil and natural gas industry, while Russia has privatized its oil and natural gas industry.
